verses.verse: And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Hew <WH6458> <WH8798> thee two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68> like unto the first <WH7223>: and I will write <WH3789> <WH8804> upon these tables <WH3871> the words <WH1697> that were in the first <WH7223> tables <WH3871>, which thou brakest <WH7665> <WH8765>.

And be ready <WH3559> <WH8737> in the morning <WH1242>, and come up <WH5927> <WH8804> in the morning <WH1242> unto mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>, and present <WH5324> <WH8738> thyself there to me in the top <WH7218> of the mount <WH2022>.

And no man <WH376> shall come up <WH5927> <WH8799> with thee, neither <WH408> let any man <WH376> be seen <WH7200> <WH8735> throughout all the mount <WH2022>; neither let the flocks <WH6629> nor herds <WH1241> feed <WH7462> <WH8799> before <WH4136> that mount <WH2022>.

And he hewed <WH6458> <WH8799> two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68> like unto the first <WH7223>; and Mosheh <WH4872> rose up early <WH7925> <WH8686> in the morning <WH1242>, and went up <WH5927> <WH8799> unto mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>, as the YY <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> him, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> in his hand <WH3027> the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68>.
And the YY <WH3068> descended <WH3381> <WH8799> in the cloud <WH6051>, and stood <WH3320> <WH8691> with him there, and proclaimed <WH7121> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>.

And the YY <WH3068> passed by <WH5674> <WH8799> before him <WH6440>, and proclaimed <WH7121> <WH8799>, The YY <WH3068>, The YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH410>, merciful <WH7349> and gracious <WH2587>, longsuffering <WH750> <WH639>, and abundant <WH7227> in goodness <WH2617> and truth <WH571>,

Keeping <WH5341> <WH8802> mercy <WH2617> for thousands <WH505>, forgiving <WH5375> <WH8802> iniquity <WH5771> and transgression <WH6588> and sin <WH2403>, and that will by no means <WH5352> <WH8763> clear <WH5352> <WH8762> the guilty; visiting <WH6485> <WH8802> the iniquity <WH5771> of the fathers <WH1> upon the children <WH1121>, and upon the children's <WH1121> children, unto the third <WH8029> and to the fourth <WH7256> generation.
And Mosheh <WH4872> made haste <WH4116> <WH8762>, and bowed his head <WH6915> <WH8799> toward the earth <WH776>, and worshipped <WH7812> <WH8691>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, If now I have found <WH4672> <WH8804> grace <WH2580> in thy sight <WH5869>, O YY <WH136>, let my YY <WH136>, I pray thee, go <WH3212> <WH8799> among <WH7130> us; for it is a stiffnecked <WH7186> <WH6203> people <WH5971>; and pardon <WH5545> <WH8804> our iniquity <WH5771> and our sin <WH2403>, and take us for thine inheritance <WH5157> <WH8804>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, I make <WH3772> <WH8802> a covenant <WH1285>: before all thy people <WH5971> I will do <WH6213> <WH8799> marvels <WH6381> <WH8737>, such as have not been done <WH1254> <WH8738> in all the earth <WH776>, nor in any nation <WH1471>: and all the people <WH5971> among <WH7130> which thou art shall see <WH7200> <WH8804> the work <WH4639> of the YY <WH3068>: for it is a terrible thing <WH3372> <WH8737> that I will do <WH6213> <WH8802> with thee.

Observe <WH8104> <WH8798> thou that which I command <WH6680> <WH8764> thee this day <WH3117>: behold, I drive out <WH1644> <WH8802> before <WH6440> thee the Amorite <WH567>, and the Kanahanite <WH3669>, and the Hittite <WH2850>, and the Perizzite <WH6522>, and the Hivite <WH2340>, and the Y'vusi <WH2983>.

Take heed <WH8104> <WH8734> to thyself, lest thou make <WH3772> <WH8799> a covenant <WH1285> with the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the land <WH776> whither thou goest <WH935> <WH8802>, lest it be for a snare <WH4170> in the midst <WH7130> of thee:
But ye shall destroy <WH5422> <WH8799> their altars <WH4196>, break <WH7665> <WH8762> their images <WH4676>, and cut down <WH3772> <WH8799> their groves <WH842>:
For thou shalt worship <WH7812> <WH8691> no other <WH312> god <WH410>: for the YY <WH3068>, whose name <WH8034> is Jealous <WH7067>, is a jealous <WH7067> 'Elohim <WH410>:

Lest thou make <WH3772> <WH8799> a covenant <WH1285> with the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the land <WH776>, and they go a whoring <WH2181> <WH8804> after <WH310> their 'elohim <WH430>, and do sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8804> unto their 'elohim <WH430>, and one call <WH7121> <WH8804> thee, and thou eat <WH398> <WH8804> of his sacrifice <WH2077>;

And thou take <WH3947> <WH8804> of their daughters <WH1323> unto thy sons <WH1121>, and their daughters <WH1323> go a whoring <WH2181> <WH8804> after <WH310> their 'elohim <WH430>, and make <WH2181> thy sons <WH1121> go a whoring <WH2181> <WH8689> after <WH310> their 'elohim <WH430>.
Thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8799> thee no molten <WH4541> 'elohim <WH430>.

The feast <WH2282> of matzah <WH4682> shalt thou keep <WH8104> <WH8799>. Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> thou shalt eat <WH398> <WH8799> matzah <WH4682>, as I commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> thee, in the time <WH4150> of the month <WH2320> Abib <WH24>: for in the month <WH2320> Abib <WH24> thou camest out <WH3318> <WH8804> from Egypt <WH4714>.
All that openeth <WH6363> the matrix <WH7358> is mine; and every firstling <WH6363> among thy cattle <WH4735>, whether ox <WH7794> or sheep <WH7716>, that is male <WH2142> <WH8735>.

But the firstling <WH6363> of an ass <WH2543> thou shalt redeem <WH6299> <WH8799> with a lamb <WH7716>: and if thou redeem <WH6299> <WH8799> him not, then shalt thou break his neck <WH6202> <WH8804>. All the firstborn <WH1060> of thy sons <WH1121> thou shalt redeem <WH6299> <WH8799>. And none shall appear <WH7200> <WH8735> before <WH6440> me empty <WH7387>.

Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> thou shalt work <WH5647> <WH8799>, but on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> thou shalt rest <WH7673> <WH8799>: in earing time <WH2758> and in harvest <WH7105> thou shalt rest <WH7673> <WH8799>.

And thou shalt observe <WH6213> <WH8799> the feast <WH2282> of weeks <WH7620>, of the firstfruits <WH1061> of wheat <WH2406> harvest <WH7105>, and the feast <WH2282> of ingathering <WH614> at the year's <WH8141> end <WH8622>.
Thrice <WH6471> <WH7969> in the year <WH8141> shall all your men children <WH2138> appear <WH7200> <WH8735> before <WH6440> the YY <WH113> GOD <WH3068>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

For I will cast out <WH3423> <WH8686> the nations <WH1471> before <WH6440> thee, and enlarge <WH7337> <WH8689> thy borders <WH1366>: neither shall any man <WH376> desire <WH2530> <WH8799> thy land <WH776>, when thou shalt go up <WH5927> <WH8800> to appear <WH7200> <WH8736> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> thrice <WH6471> <WH7969> in the year <WH8141>.

Thou shalt not offer <WH7819> <WH8799> the blood <WH1818> of my sacrifice <WH2077> with leaven <WH2557>; neither shall the sacrifice <WH2077> of the feast <WH2282> of the passover <WH6453> be left <WH3885> <WH8799> unto the morning <WH1242>.

The first <WH7225> of the firstfruits <WH1061> of thy land <WH127> thou shalt bring <WH935> <WH8686> unto the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>. Thou shalt not seethe <WH1310> <WH8762> a kid <WH1423> in his mother's <WH517> milk <WH2461>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Write <WH3789> <WH8798> thou these words <WH1697>: for after the tenor <WH6310> of these words <WH1697> I have made <WH3772> <WH8804> a covenant <WH1285> with thee and with Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And he was there with the YY <WH3068> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights <WH3915>; he did neither eat <WH398> <WH8804> bread <WH3899>, nor drink <WH8354> <WH8804> water <WH4325>. And he wrote <WH3789> <WH8799> upon the tables <WH3871> the words <WH1697> of the covenant <WH1285>, the ten <WH6235> Mitzvot <WH1697>.

And it came to pass, when Mosheh <WH4872> came down <WH3381> <WH8800> from mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514> with the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of testimony <WH5715> in Mosheh <WH4872> ' hand <WH3027>, when he came down <WH3381> <WH8800> from the mount <WH2022>, that Mosheh <WH4872> wist <WH3045> <WH8804> not that the skin <WH5785> of his face <WH6440> shone <WH7160> <WH8804> while he talked <WH1696> <WH8763> with him.

And when Aharon <WH175> and all the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> Mosheh <WH4872>, behold, the skin <WH5785> of his face <WH6440> shone <WH7160> <WH8804>; and they were afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> to come nigh <WH5066> <WH8800> him.

And Mosheh <WH4872> called <WH7121> <WH8799> unto them; and Aharon <WH175> and all the rulers <WH5387> of the congregation <WH5712> returned <WH7725> <WH8799> unto him: and Mosheh <WH4872> talked <WH1696> <WH8762> with them.

And afterward <WH310> all the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> came nigh <WH5066> <WH8738>: and he gave them in Mitzvah <WH6680> <WH8762> all that the YY <WH3068> had spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> with him in mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>.
And till Mosheh <WH4872> had done <WH3615> <WH8762> speaking <WH1696> <WH8763> with them, he put <WH5414> <WH8799> a vail <WH4533> on his face <WH6440>.

But when Mosheh <WH4872> went in <WH935> <WH8800> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> to speak <WH1696> <WH8763> with him, he took <WH5493> the vail <WH4533> off <WH5493> <WH8686>, until he came out <WH3318> <WH8800>. And he came out <WH3318> <WH8804>, and spake <WH1696> <WH8765> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> that which he was commanded <WH6680> <WH8792>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> saw <WH7200> <WH8804> the face <WH6440> of Mosheh <WH4872>, that the skin <WH5785> of Mosheh <WH4872> ' face <WH6440> shone <WH7160> <WH8804>: and Mosheh <WH4872> put <WH7725> the vail <WH4533> upon his face <WH6440> again <WH7725> <WH8689>, until he went <WH935> <WH8800> in to speak <WH1696> <WH8763> with him.
